TopicTitle: Will this help with memory issues

Articles.Content:
http://www.ntcore.com/4gb_patch.php

Will this tool let my game run smoother if I have a lot of mods installed?
You should have put this in the support fourm.

Hmm. CFF explorer...

From what I recall poking into the KSP.exe wth the CFF explorer myself, it already has that flag set anyway... lemme just check... yep. KSP already has this flag set, so the patch will do nothing.

Hmm. CFF explorer...

From what I recall poking into the KSP.exe wth the CFF explorer myself, it already has that flag set anyway... lemme just check... yep. KSP already has this flag set, so the patch will do nothing.

Well, Drats. Thank you.

If you're having problems with game performance, there are loads of suggestions on the web with instructions on optimising Windows or Linux based gaming machines. Graphics drivers play a big part here, so keep an eye out.
